text: Karapa Mandal is one of the 64 mandals in East Godavari District of Andhra Pradesh. As per census 2011, there are 19 villages. == Demographics == Karapa Mandal has total population of 76,398 as per the Census 2011 out of which 38,460 are males while 37,938 are females and the average Sex Ratio of Karapa Mandal is 986. The total literacy rate of Karapa Mandal is 68.61%. The male literacy rate is 63.59% and the female literacy rate is 58.76%. == Towns and villages == === Villages === #Aratlakatta #China Mamidada #G. Bhavaram #Gorripudi #Gurajanapalle #Karapa #Kongodu #Koripalle #Kurada #Nadakuduru #Patharlagadda #Peddapurapadu #Penuguduru #Siripuram #Vakada #Velangi #Vemulavada #Yandamuru #Z. title: Karapa mandal
